title: betnomi
author: betnomi
created_time: February 01, 2023, 10:08:20 PMLast edit: May 17, 2023, 12:25:55 PM by betnomi
content: It's me again! This is the 7th round, thanks to which the custom cold wallet will find its new owner.This RAFFLE is dedicated to the annual "Bitcointalk Community Awards" event where Betnomi was invited to be a sponsor! Good luck!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.Please, if you already have a custom wallet, give way to others.We may, at our discretion, ignore applies (including inactive posters, etc).How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Can take two slots if you voted in the topic Bitcointalk Community Awards üèÜAfter I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - minerjones01 - willi997402 - GazetaBitcoin03 - GazetaBitcoin04 - _BlackStar05 - Timelord206706 - Frank AlpenCoin07 - krogoth08 - Thiago00709 - Dernoste10 - Darker4511 - Mitchell12 - GrosWesh13 - Remsjack14 - famososMuertos15 - wwzsocki16 - Sunny17 - sam0018 - Real-Duke19 - _BlackStar20 - Nara189221 - av8rjeff22 - Helena Yu23 - NeuroticFish24 - Woodie25 - Woodie26 - sam0027 - Mbitr28 - notblox129 - NeuroticFish30 - F2b31 - cydrix32 - d3nz33 - Eclipse3334 - Nara189235 - verndog36 - Caribbean37 - Mbitr38 - Steeley39 - rat03gopoh40 - bitbollo41 - AHOYBRAUSE42 - tweetious43 - JanEmil44 - ajiz13845 - DirtyBirdE46 - ajiz13847 - examplens48 - anonymousminer49 - m201750 - examplens51 - Ratimov52 - aoluain53 - julerz1254 - digicoinuser55 - cygan56 - Hotdog757 - Maus072858 - rat03gopoh59 - bestcoin_5960 - randomwork61 - Danydee62 - Ryu_Ar163 - dcarter64 - HeRetiK65 - entebah66 - TheBeardedBaby67 - m201768 - salad daging69 - bitbollo70 - Inagame71 - owlcatz72 - Amax1673 - Dernoste74 - willi997475 - 2stout76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - cygan78 - Amax1679 - YodasRedRocket80 - Koal-8481 - CoinageMint82 - kryptowerk83 - haloxon84 - mole081585 - kryptowerk86 - buckrogers87 - Maus072888 - Buchi-8889 - pawel777790 - salad daging91 - notblox192 - JanEmil93 - xLays94 - PMICT95 - Crytocanuk96 - famososMuertos97 - Doblezero98 - julerz1299 - minerjonesPlease note that this item will ship in March. ü¶ä

comments.body: Add me 2 slots because I vote in the thread [Voting 2022] Bitcointalk Community Awards04 & 19 - _BlackStarBest Regard..
